intro.description: This tool is intended to display information about the pixel pointed by the mouse. This information include: x and y positions, pixel intensity, resolution, etc.

item.title: Using the Pixel information box tool
item.description: The pixel information tool is available from the image tools palette. When the tool is opened, a cross hair is displayed as a driver to the mouse. The mouse movement updates the tool table with information about the pixel pointed to. A click on the plot creates a point region. Created point regions can be moved or deleted.
